songs.title: Fuck Him He’s a DJ
songs.album: I Am the Dance Commander + I Command You to Dance: The Remix Album
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Drop this, drop this, drop, drop this, this, this, this
Drop this, drop this, drop, drop this track

[Verse 1]
He’s a stereotype, he’s got the baseball cap
And he’s building the hype as he’s feeding me this hot track, oh
He’s feeding me this hot track, oh, oh
You see, we share the same God, we’ve got the same love
I never wanna stop, I don’t wanna give him up
Nah, I don’t wanna give him up, nah, nah

[Pre-Chorus 1]
I-I-I-I am losing time
As you're feeding me this hot track
I-I-I-I know what I’ve got on, my mind

[Chorus]
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
All night long, he’s got the beat
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
Keep playing that song, it works for me
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
All night long, he’s got the beat
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
Keep playing that song, it works for me

[Verse 2]
Now he’s loving me up with the baseline fat
It’s an aphrodisiac just watching you like that, oh
Just watching you like that, oh, oh

[Pre-Chorus 2]
I-I-I-I am losing time
As you're feeding me this hot track
I-I-I-I know what I’ve got on, my mind

[Chorus]
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
All night long, he’s got the beat
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
Keep playing that song, it works for me
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
All night long, he’s got the beat
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
Keep playing that song, it works for me

[Bridge]
Drop this track
Dr-dr-dr-drop this track (For me)
Ahahaha, ahahaha
Ahahaha, ahahaha

[Chorus]
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
All night long, he’s got the beat
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
Keep playing that song, it works for me
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
All night long, he’s got the beat
Fuck him, he’s a DJ
Keep playing that song, it works for me
Fuck him, he's a DJ
